name: Asian Poached Cod
author: CollinW
summary: Quick and easy way to prepare cod that is delicious and flavorful. Serve with white rice and vegetables.
ingredients: 1 (2 inch) piece ginger, cut into thin strips
¾ teaspoon red pepper flakes, or more to taste
directions: Arrange cod into the bottom of a saucepan
Mix water, soy sauce, green onions, ginger, garlic, sesame oil, red pepper flakes, and Chinese five-spice powder together in a bowl; pour over the cod
Place saucepan over high heat and bring liquid to a boil; reduce heat to low and cook at a simmer until cod flakes easily with a fork, 12 to 15 minutes
Remove cod from liquid with a slotted spoon
